frontmatter.name: Apoorv Anand
frontmatter.description: Apoorv is contemplating the void between the online and offline version of himself. When not in deep thoughts, he collaborates with researchers, activists and other normal human beings to make sense of the dystopian universe of [Open] & Public datasets.
